Articles.Content:
Hey,

there is a important feature missing, which is default on all forums (because usefull), to see the latest started threads.

Why does it not exist here?
Try clicking on "What's New?" in the top left, just under the Store button

Try clicking on "What's New?" in the top left, just under the Store button

No, I mean threads (topics), not postings
Ahh yeah, we seem not to have that, if it's supported by VB5 maybe we can get it after the upgrade

Okay, but it should be already supported, because it's a really default/main feature of every forum software.

That's why I wonder it's not availabhle here.

And in general, when I open the forum in my web browser the first thing I want to know which new topics are there, so I'm really wondering about that feature missing here.
Not much functional difference between "New Posts" and "What's New". The presentation is different but the query looks the same. Is one meant to be different?
